humanum_full_description_en:
From " kou ", " ba " sound, used as modal auxiliary words in modern Chinese.

" Ba " as a modal particle can express agreement and approval. Li Jun <a bunch of keys>: "Well then! Let's open it now!"

" Ba " as a modal particle can also express discussion, suggestion, or imperative. Zhao Shuli and Li Zhun (Heirloom): "What does that tattered look like, aren't you afraid that my brother-in-law is here to make a joke? Come on, let's move!"

" Ba " as a modal particle also expresses doubt or speculation. Lao She "Black and White Li": "I gave him a cigarette and gave him a headline: "What's the matter?""

" Ba " as a modal particle also means pause and hypothesis. Chen Rong "Troubled Sunday": "When I heard it, I blamed the poor. Control it, I don't know if it's right or not; don't care, I can't bear it."

" Ba " is also used as an onomatopoeia in modern Chinese. "The Heroes of the Sons and Daughters" Chapter 15: "(Deng Jiugong) put the wine glass in his hand on the table early, and said, "Brother, how did you know this person from birth?"

humanum_full_description:
從「口」，「巴」聲，在現代漢語中用作語氣助詞。

　　「吧」作語氣助詞可表示同意、認可。李準〈一串鑰匙〉：「那好吧！現在就開吧！」

　　「吧」作語氣助詞也可表示商量、提議、祈使。趙樹理李準〈傳家寶〉：「那破破爛爛像個什麼樣子，你不怕我姐夫來了笑話？來，咱們搬了吧！」

　　「吧」作語氣助詞還表示疑問或揣測。老舍〈黑白李〉：「我給了他支煙捲，給他提了個頭兒：『有什麼事吧？』」

　　「吧」作語氣助詞亦表示停頓和假設。諶容〈煩惱的星期日〉：「我一聽，怪可憐的。管吧，不知管得對不對；不管吧，又不忍落。」

　　「吧」在近代漢語中也用作象聲詞。《兒女英雄傳》第15回：「（鄧九公）早把手裏的酒杯吧的往桌子上一放，說：『老弟，你是怎生曉得這個人？』」
